$values.Name: Starting Village
$values.DayDescription:
You step out of your small hut and look up at the sky.
Through the old gnarled trees, you spot a huge black storm cloud rolling in.
Everyone you see is rushing to get inside to avoid the coming storm.
You have been in this village since as long as you can remember, and you have never seen anything like this before.

You see everyone run inside their houses except for the Crazy Old Man standing in front of his house to the west.
He is staring at the sky with a look of dread on his face.

Mother: You better hurry. A storm is coming.
You need to get going if you want to make it to High Village before it starts.
You donâ€™t want to be soaking wet on your last day of training.
